name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time Rabbit - Your Smart Work Timer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Maximize your productivity with Time Rabbit - the ultimate work timer designed for IT specialists.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🕒 Time Rabbit - Smart Work Timer & Earnings Tracker

Time Rabbit is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help IT specialists, freelancers, marketers, SEO professionals, project managers, and remote workers track their working hours, calculate earnings, and boost productivity with ease.

🎯 Why Use Time Rabbit?
Time Rabbit is more than just a timer — it's your personal productivity assistant. Whether you’re managing projects, tracking freelance work, or optimizing marketing tasks, Time Rabbit ensures accurate time management and fair billing for your work hours.

💡 Key Features:

⏱️ Track Your Time with Ease:

Start, pause, and stop the timer with one click.
Set custom work durations or use an open-ended timer.

💸 Automatic Earnings Calculator:

Input your hourly rate, and Time Rabbit will calculate your earnings in real-time.
Displays total earnings upon task completion.

📊 Work Session History (Coming Soon):

View past sessions, earnings, and total work time statistics.

🔔 Reminders & Alerts (Coming Soon):

Never miss a deadline — receive notifications when your timer ends.

🔗 Integration-Ready (Future Updates):

Connect with Google Calendar, Trello, or Jira for seamless task management.

🎨 Simple & Intuitive Design:

Minimalist design for easy use and clear work tracking.
